sense.gloss: fight (against time, poverty, etc.), struggle (for freedom, survival, etc.), war (e.g. on drugs), battle (e.g. against nature)
struggle (for rights, higher wages, etc.), strife, (labor) dispute, strike
variety of knowledge and experience useful for handling things impromptu
square on a grid, cell of a grid
square bearing block (at the top of a pillar)
to, traditional unit of volume, approx. 18 litres
square bearing block (at the top of a pillar)
the Big Dipper (asterism), the Plough, the Plow
kegs of sake, lot of sake

sdata.j: ↑北斗七星↑↓ほくとしちせい↓は↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓に↑見↑↓み↓つかる。
sdata.e: You can find the Big Dipper easily.

sdata.j: ↑北斗↑↓ほくと↓の↑拳↑↓けん↓が↑大好↑↓だいす↓きだよ！
sdata.e: I love Fist of the North Star!

sdata.j: ↑星座↑↓せいざ↓は↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑詳↑↓くわ↓しくないな。オリオン↑座↑↓ざ↓とカシオペア↑座↑↓ざ↓くらいしか↑見↑↓み↓てもわからない。あと↑北斗七星↑↓ほくとしちせい↓もわかる。
sdata.e: I know nothing about constellations. I can only recognize Orion and Cassiopeia. Oh, and the Big Dipper, too.

sdata.j: あれは↑北斗七星↑↓ほくとしちせい↓だよ。
「お↑母↑↓かあ↓さんのしゃべり↑方↑↓かた↓って、おばあちゃんにそっくりだよね？」「そりゃそうよ。おばあちゃんに↑育↑↓そだ↓てられたんだから。↑優↑↓ゆう↓↑斗↑↓と↓だって、お↑父↑↓とう↓さんの↑話↑↓はな↓し↑方↑↓かた↓にそっくりよ」
sdata.e: Don't you think Mom speaks exactly like Grandma? "Yeah, she does. That's because she was raised by her. Yuuto speaks just like his dad, too."
